Short Bio

Hello I'm Giuseppe Saccardi, M.Sc. in Mathematics for Life and Data Science at the University of Trento and Data Scientist at Kebula.
I am passionate about Artificial Intelligence algorithms and the theory behind them. At the same time, I'm drawn to all the possible real-world applications of AI.
